text: Rolland Gregory Smith (born December 6, 1941) is an American retired television news reporter and anchor. He is best known for his time in New York City. He is known for being the host of The Morning Program. Smith was born in San Diego, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * Rolland Smith's official website * Rolland Smith's official blog Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:American television news anchors Category:Journalists from California Category:Journalists from New York City Category:People from San Diego
title: Rolland Smith
